results.title: city school diary_02
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.

results.title: City scene
results.creator_credit: George Kaczender, Gordon Burwash, Guy Glover and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: No matter where you go in the world, it is in the city square that you see the character and culture of a people. Filmed in Montreal, Athens, and Bangkok, this film makes interesting comparisons of life at the core of three great cities. Photography by Paul Leach.

results.title: City sailors
results.creator_credit: Jack Rogers, R. Maslyn Williams and Australian news and Information Bureau
results.brief_description: Shows Sydney Harbour with its wide scope for sailing, the innumerable bays and inlets which provide safe mooring and the warm sunlit days which have made sailing a popular summer pastime. Commentator: James Dibble.

results.creator_credit: Roger Dunton, David Powell and Abacus Documentaries
results.brief_description: Shows how the City of London, Lloyd’s, the Bank of England and other commercial institutions support the Port of London, and how the Port supplies goods to the city.

results.title: City out of time
results.creator_credit: Colin Low, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A portrait of Venice that expores the rich legacy of art bequeathed to all. Two hundred years ago Canaletto caught its elusive beauty, and in this film details of his pictures rise before you - spired churches and turreted palaces soar into a blue Mediterranean sky. Narrated by William Shatner. (Award: Vancouver)

results.title: City on fire
results.creator_credit: Ringo Lam and Media Asia Distribution
results.brief_description: Charismatic Hong Kong film star Chow Yun Fat stars in Ringo Lam’s explosive action film about an undercover cop whose investigation into a series of jewelery robberies around Hong Kong draws him into a dangerous circle of new friends. He becomes buddies with a member of this gang (Danny Lee) and is soon involved in the gang’s next big heist. This is a classic example of the Hong Kong action film genre. (Awards: Winner of Best Director and Best Actor at the 7th Annual Hong Kong Film Awards) In Cantonese with English subtitles.

results.title: City of the sixties
results.creator_credit: Stuart Glover, Brisbane City Council and Cinesound
results.brief_description: Made for the Brisbane City Council showing the advances and achievements reached by capital of Queensland, Brisbane. Contains short clips of the Council’s activities such as roads and public transport, health, childcare etc as well as a celebration of cultural achievements of the city.

results.title: City of the angels
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Barnes, Keith Adam and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description: In the late 18th century, Rama I, first of the great Chakri kings, ordered his architects to build a new capital for Thailand - Bangkok. In Thai, Bangkok is called the “City of Angels”. Today one tenth of Thailand’s population lives in Bangkok, the most urbanised city in Thailand, which contains all the elements of Thai life seen in the extreme. Presenter Keith Adam, takes us on a tour of this city of contrast, a city of canals, superb temples and palaces alongside bustling markets, traffic jams, pollution and poverty.
